link_name: Axia ALSA Soundcard Driver for Livewire
link_desc:
Monitoring of the AXIA - ALSA soundcard driver for Livewire (Axia IP Audio Driver for Linux).

This template collection monitors the components of the AXIA - ALSA soundcard driver for Livewire, namely the Axia Livewire Routing Daemon (axialwrd), the Axia Advertising Daemon (axiaadvd) and the Axia GPIO Bridge for Livewire/Control Surface control (axiagpr). There's also a check to see if the snd-axià kernel module is loaded.

Refer to the README for a list of features, supported items, triggers, graphs, macros and installation instructions.
author: Christian Affolter
